abstract: Altria Group said Monday it reached an agreement to buy UST, the maker of Skoal and Copenhagen smokeless tobacco, for about $10.4 billion. Altria will pay $69.50 per share in cash for each UST share, a premium of nearly 29 percent above UST’s closing price on Thursday, the day before The New York Times  reported that the companies were in negotiations.
